subject: English
goals: Understand the basics of sentence structure, including identifying subjects, predicates, and objects. Begin distinguishing different parts of speech in sentences.
milestones: By the end of the week, the student should be able to identify the subject and predicate in a sentence and recognize basic parts of speech such as nouns, verbs, and adjectives.

timetable.session: Saturday morning from 10:00 AM to 11:00 AM

learning_tasks.task: Watch an introductory video on sentence structure.
Read an article on the basic parts of speech.

practice_tasks.task: Complete a worksheet on identifying subjects and predicates.
Identify parts of speech in five example sentences.

resources: Khan Academy's Grammar course, Purdue OWL, Grammar Monster website, and relevant chapters in the studentâ€™s English textbook.
